title: [GAMEPLAY] Classic Gangplank recall
body:
With classic Gangplank skin, each time a player recalls, there is no crate on which one Ganplank is supposed to sit. With it, he appears to be sitting on nothing.

To see it, you just need to recall as Gangplank. Everything goes, as it should - but without the crate. It hurts eyes.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are looking into it!
